resources.string: The configuration to start the game isn\'t correct. Remember that you must select at least one type of game.
Are you sure you want to leave the game?
That I do not dare? Of course I dare
You must enter a name for the player
You can\'t create a 0 or negative teams
There can not be more teams than players
All right!! For having answered you can send whoever you want to drink %d
So you play, send whoever you want to drink %d
This game is wonderful, right?? Send whoever you want to drink %d and recommend the app to more people
If this is just a game… Drink %d, you\'ve to answer the next
You haven\'t understood how to play. To win you have to be brave, drink %d
It seems that the thing is still cold. Drink %d to see if you get warm
In this game we like daring people. You can send whoever you want to drink %d
Don\'t you think your friends are too fine? Deal %d drinks
Very well!! For brave you\'ve to choose who drinks your %d drinks
Cloc-cloc!! Chicken. The cowards have to drink. Drink %d
You haven\'t understood how to play. To win you have to be brave, drink %d to see if the next one you cheer up
There\'s something that doesn\'t work. The cowards stay at home. Drink %d and next time dare
Those who have voted %s can be sent who they want to drink %d
Player %s has already finished his Until That
You must enter a number of teams
There\'s a problem with the camera and you can\'t take the picture
There\'s a problem with the internet connection. You won\'t be able to share the image
I give you this photo. Prost&Drink
How wonderful is this game! Toast and drinks %d
You are still very sober… Send to drink %d
What a diction! Send to drink %d
Are you going so bad yet? Drink %d
It\'s going to be not… Drink %d
In this game you\'ll have to get the needle of the meter in the correct position. To do this you must turn the phone to make it move. Pay attention to the clues.
The most important thing is to participate. Drink %d.
It isn\'t bad at all. Send whoever you want to %d drink.
The terror of the moles! Send to drink %d, legend.
In this game you have 30 seconds to crush the maximum number of moles possible.
Watch out! Giving a burrow without a mole will be penalized.
And first of all… \nDon\'t kill the lucky gnome! \nOr you will be severely penalized.

We go with a different game. Have you drunk a lot? Try to find the north. You\'ll have 3 attempts to make the mobile point north. In each attempt there will be a countdown of 3 seconds and then you\'ll see a compass. Will you be able to orient yourself?
How little have you drunk. You can still find the north… Drink %d
All right. You\'ve found the north. You can send whoever you want to drink %d
Be careful, you get lost. This time don\'t drink. Give your %d to whoever you want
Oops Don\'t you know how to guide? Drink %d
You aren\'t very good at this. Drink %d and more luck next time. Oh, and don\'t go to the casino.
Good memory. Send whomever you want to drink %d
Oh fuck. Maybe next time. Drink %d drinks
In this game we\'ll show you a series of cards. \nYou must remember their position. \nAfter a while, we\'ll hide them and you should try to find the letter we asked for.
You have 15 seconds to memorize where the cards are. \nLook good. \nWhen you\'re ready, hit the button.
Those who have done so drink a drink

Thanks for using our application. We\'ll briefly explain everything that can be done in it. I hope you enjoy it. To start, you have to know that the application has two parts. One to make draws of teams and another to play drinking.

From the start screen of the application you can access the draw section. In that part you can indicate the players you want in a list, the number of teams you want to make and, by clicking on the button, the application will generate the teams you want. This option is useful for when you want to play other games such as parchís or billiards.

The functioning of the games is as follows: At the top of the screen you\'ll see which player should participate at any time. Before starting, the name of the players will be asked to identify you, it\'s recommended that you don\'t put two players with the same name. The game has no end, and they\'ll appear evidence that you\'ll have to do. Each test can send you drink or give drink to the other players. Don\'t forget to fill the glass.

In this game you\'ve to try to point your mobile to the north. You\'ll have 3 attempts, in which you\'ll be shown a countdown to look for it. After you run out of time you can see the compass to know what you\'re wrong.
For the friends who aren\'t with you. In this game you\'ll be challenged to take a picture of something from the party and share it. Let them die of envy.
Surely you have all played the cazatopos. Try to kill as many moles as you can in 30 seconds, but be careful, if you make a mistake you\'ll be penalized.
Let yourself go. Until you pass a number of shifts you\'ve to do something. You just have to read the message and… What the game decides!
The application will ask you questions (maybe compromised). If you don\'t answer you\'ll have to drink. Let's see if alcohol releases your tongue.
What do you not dare? If you dare and do the challenges that we propose, you\'ll have a reward, if not punishment.

There\'s no one who understands you drunk. Try saying a tongue twister that we propose to the telephone microphone. He\'ll be able to understand you. Remember… At the microphone, not at the bar column!
Easy, simple and for the whole group. Survey everyone to see which option they prefer from the ones we give you. Check the most voted option and the application\'ll tell you what to do.
In this game you only have to guess the card that is face down. Three cards will appear, one by one. And you will be asked if it is red or black, or even or odd. Try to hit them all.
In this game we show you 12 cards. You will have 15 seconds to memorize their position, after which, we will turn over the cards. We will show you a letter and we will ask you where it is.
This activity is group. A sentence of type "I\'ve never done X" is enunciated. Those members of the group who have ever done so should have a drink.
Make sure you always have a drink in your glass
There\'ll appear games that will tell you what to do, you have to answer everything and dare to perform the challenges
If you still have doubts we\'ll show you the instructions
Go write down the name of the players that will participate, if you want to remove someone you can do it by keeping their name pressed. When everyone is on the list to play, hit the play and… PLAY!!
Here you can make teams. Add the names of the people who will play to the list and put the number of teams below. If you want to remove a player, keep their name pressed.

Do you need to cheer up a bit for the night?
As we also do and after a long time using other people's applications we have ourself asked why.
We are 3 students of Computer Engineering that we have proposed this application for the subject of Mobile Devices Software. 
We hope you enjoy it.

Samuel Cifuentes García
Enol García González
Jorge Iturrioz del Vigo
